Evil Food Eater Conchita (revised)

悪(あく)食(じき)娘(むすめ)コンチータ(コンチータ)（(（)改(かい)）(）)akujiki musume KONCHIITA (kai)

mothy's fourth album centered around a new arrangement of Evil Food Eater Conchita alongside songs released online since EVILS FOREST. The album was released on August 10, 2010, and is currently unavailable.

Website · Playlist · Scans

Tracklist

  1. Evil Food Eater Conchita (revised)
  2. Desert BLUEBIRD
  3. Full Moon Laboratory
  4. The Frog's and My Love Romance
  5. Clockwork Lullaby (demo version)

Notes

  • The album was illustrated by Ichika.
  • mothy burned the CDs himself, and only about 100 copies were made.
Additional Albums
The Daughter of Evil: BGM Reading Collection · The Daughter of Evil ~Gemini of Charm~ · Evil Food Eater Conchita (revised) · Evils Kingdom · Four Melodies of Evil ~The Daughter of Evil Novel Music Collection~ · Screws, Gears, and Pride · Seven Crimes and Punishments
